name: Whight & Co
address: Marine Drive and Aloe Avenue, Colombo 3
description: Whight & Co is amazing for coffee. They've got Cold Drip down to a science. The food is alright, too.
tip: Get one of the good seats with a view.
review:
Whight & Co.'s coffee is still the main reason to go there, but their food impressed us on our last visit too.
We like the Papdi Chat Prawns and the Cold Drip. Their staff is a little haphazard, lately.
